name: Future Fragments
notes:
Please make sure you got "Prefer system libraries" disabled in "Preferences"
Also, consider enabling DXVK:  https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/How-to:-DXVK
content:
files:
- ffexe: N/A:Select Future Fragments EXE
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $ffexe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: videomemorysize=2048
    description: Increasing video memory size
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
